DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect cilostazol loading plan PCI major adverse cardiac cerebrovascular event patient coronary artery disease .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study Cilostazol Loading Elective Percutaneous Coronary Intervention
DOC.criteria: Patients undergo elective PCI Presence coronary lesion amenable stent Cardiogenic shock Urgent PCI Hypersensitivity aspirin , clopidogrel , cilostazol LVEF < 30 % congestive heart failure Bleeding diathesis leukocyte count < 3,000/mm3 and/or platelet count < 100,000/mm3 aspartate aminotransferase alanine aminotransferase > 3 time upper normal ; serum creatinine > 2.0 mg/dl noncardiac disease life expectancy < 1 year inability follow protocol
